title: Lf Master/Chall Top laner for OOL
body:
Hello lads dis is just a short message

GrV eSports is looking for a top laner dat keen to joina team for OOL add me in game and we will talk

replies.body: I'm not master or challenger (I'm bronze :^) only reached level 30 earlier this year however I have been playing since mid season 4). But if you guys can't find a top laner, i'll be up for it
